title: Learner-Centered Personal Learning Environment (PLE) Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental digital literacy and experience using learning management tools
context.additional_context: Targeting learners preparing for employment based on intermediate expertise in social studies, the goal is to cultivate the ability to autonomously design learning environments via LMS in BYOD settings

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three PLE components aligned with their learning goals and styles
Learners can establish and execute self-directed learning plans using collaborative tools within LMS and external digital resources
Learners can reconfigure learning environments at least twice by incorporating feedback during the PLE design process
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
